text: Ana nehige'zama ha'ma rente'za krunagema huntaza vahera anakre ku'a (saket) zafino kugusopa rupopo nehuno anage huno zamasmi'ne, tamagri korankumi'mo'a tamagritami tamasenire megahie! Nagripina mago knazani'a omanetfa hugahie. Amareti agafa huno vaniana, Jiu vaherompage megi'a vahete vugahue.
